bridge-type.label: Homematic Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Homematic bridge represents a Homematic gateway

parameter.name: gatewayAddress
parameter.label: Gateway Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Homematic gateway

parameter.name: gatewayType
parameter.label: Gateway Type
parameter.description: Hint for the binding to identify the gateway type

parameter.name: callbackHost
parameter.label: Callback Network Address
parameter.description: Callback network address of the ESH runtime, default is auto-discovery

parameter.name: bindAddress
parameter.label: Bind Address
parameter.description: The address the XML-/BINRPC server binds to, default is callbackHost

parameter.name: xmlCallbackPort
parameter.label: XML-RPC Callback Port
parameter.description: Callback port of the binding's XML-RPC server. If no value is specified, xmlCallbackPort starts with 9125 and counts up

parameter.name: binCallbackPort
parameter.label: BIN-RPC Callback Port
parameter.description: Callback port of the binding's BIN-RPC server. If no value is specified, xmlCallbackPort starts with 9126 and counts up

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout in seconds for connections to a Homematic gateway

parameter.name: discoveryTimeToLive
parameter.label: Discovery Time To Live
parameter.description: The time to live for discovery results of a Homematic gateway in seconds. (default = -1 -> infinite)

parameter.name: socketMaxAlive
parameter.label: Socket maxAlive
parameter.description: The maximum lifetime of a socket connection to and from a Homematic gateway in seconds (default = 900)

parameter.name: rfPort
parameter.label: RF port
parameter.description: The port number of the RF daemon

parameter.name: wiredPort
parameter.label: Wired port
parameter.description: The port number of the HS485 daemon

parameter.name: hmIpPort
parameter.label: HMIP port
parameter.description: The port number of the Homematic IP daemon

parameter.name: cuxdPort
parameter.label: CUxD port
parameter.description: The port number of the CUxD daemon

parameter.name: groupPort
parameter.label: Group port
parameter.description: The port number of the Group daemon

parameter.name: installModeDuration
parameter.label: Install mode duration
parameter.description: Time in seconds that the controller will be in install mode when a device discovery is initiated

parameter.name: unpairOnDeletion
parameter.label: Unpair Devices on Deletion
parameter.description: If set to true, devices are unpaired from the gateway when their corresponding things are removed. The option "factoryResetOnDeletion" also unpairs a device, so in order to avoid unpairing on deletion, both options need to be set to false!

parameter.name: factoryResetOnDeletion
parameter.label: Factory Reset Devices on Deletion
parameter.description: If set to true, devices are factory reset when their corresponding things are removed. Due to the factory reset, the device will also be unpaired from the gateway, even if "unpairOnDeletion" is set to false!
